Control Description: Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried.
column23: Inventory exists but is not automatically reconciled against CMDB.

Control Description: Software platforms and applications within the organization are inventoried.
column23: Software inventory is inconsistent across endpoints.

Control Description: Organizational cybersecurity policy is established and communicated.
column23: Annual policy review is on schedule.

Control Description: Asset vulnerabilities are identified and documented.
column23: Vulnerability scans occur monthly; coverage gaps for OT assets.

Control Description: Risk management processes are established, managed, and agreed to by stakeholders.
column23: Risk appetite statements not consistently applied.

Control Description: Identities and credentials are issued, managed, verified, revoked, and audited.
column23: Access lifecycle is not fully automated for contractors.
Legacy VPN clients remain in use.
File shares are not fully encrypted.

Control Description: Configuration change control processes are in place.
All users are informed and trained.
Detected events are analyzed to understand attack targets and methods.
column23: Triage workflow exists but lacks advanced correlation.

Control Description: The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events.
Response plan is executed during or after an incident.
column23: Tabletop exercises occur annually but metrics are limited.

Control Description: Incidents are reported consistent with established criteria.
column23: Escalation thresholds are documented and followed.

Control Description: Recovery plan is executed during or after a cybersecurity incident.
column23: Recovery objectives not defined for all systems.
Post-incident reviews are not consistently tracked.
